hammers.name: Train Cow Catcher
hammers.special_effect: Locomotion: sustained charge with ethereal train

hammers.name: Jolly Mallet
hammers.lore: A heavy hammer used to build Santa's workshop, now for battle.

hammers.name: Coal Forger
hammers.lore: A dense, heavy hammer used to compress and purify raw coal for the workshop's furnaces.

hammers.name: Guardian Hammer
hammers.lore: A reward for the highest-ranking Wall Guards, symbolizing the strength of the command.

hammers.name: Reindeer Sledgehammer
hammers.lore: A tool used for constructing the sleigh dock, its mass delivers immense blunt force.

hammers.name: Brussel Sprout Club
hammers.lore: A giant, dense brussel sprout fixed to a sturdy stick. Infamous for its powerful spin attack.

hammers.name: Soda Can Basher
hammers.lore: A hammer made from a massive, pressurized soda can. Explodes with fizzy damage on heavy hits.

hammers.name: Honey Dipper Mace
hammers.lore: A giant, sticky honey dipper. Enemies struck are slowed by the thick, sweet residue.

hammers.name: Inferno Hot Pot
hammers.lore: A cooking pot filled with scalding liquid, serving as the hammer's head.

hammers.name: Maki Slammer
hammers.lore: A giant, tightly rolled maki sushi on a stick. Heavy and densely packed.

hammers.name: Nigiri Basher
hammers.lore: A huge slab of nigiri rice and fish. Smells great, hits hard.

hammers.name: Watermelon Masher
hammers.lore: Half a watermelon mounted on a haft. Its juicy, blunt impact is surprisingly effective.

hammers.name: Melted Anchor
hammers.lore: The hook of a great naval anchor, partially melted down and reforged into a mighty hammerhead.

hammers.name: Mammoth Tusk Masher
hammers.lore: The base of a massive mammoth tusk, granting devastating frost damage and area-of-effect ice waves.

hammers.name: Nordic Forger
hammers.lore: A hammer forged in the Ice Elf's ancient mountain workshops, capable of shattering frozen armor.

hammers.name: Bell Ringer
hammers.lore: A heavy clapper from the Clock Tower bell. Capable of unleashing destructive sonic ripples.

hammers.name: Kaleidoscope Club
hammers.lore: The scope on a stick. Its hits don't just strike, they carve brilliant, kaleidoscopic energy waves.

hammers.name: Melody Mallet
hammers.lore: A music box mounted on a stick. Each heavy swing plays a tune that can confuse enemies.

hammers.name: Rainbow Rumbler
hammers.lore: Dozens of crayons rubber-banded together on a pencil shaft, leaving colorful trails on impact.

hammers.name: Train Hammer
hammers.lore: A heavy toy train mounted on an old rail switcher. Uses steam power for powerful, fire-based heavy attacks.
